H0.text: in the dynastic cycle what is the right to rule called. Divine Right

H1.text: in the dynastic cycle what is the right to rule called. Imperial Authority

H2.text: in the dynastic cycle what is the right to rule called. Sacred Trust

H3.text: in the dynastic cycle what is the right to rule called. Mandate of Heaven

A6.text: The Mandate of Heaven was the idea that the monarch was favored by Heaven to rule over China.

A7.text: The Mandate of Heaven was championed by the Chinese philosopher Mencius during the Warring States period.
